cast.name: 鲁兹·瓦尔德内布罗 Luz Valdenebro

introduction: August 1993. Dani has just turned 13. His family moves to a house in the suburbs. New school, new friends, new challenges. The beginning of a new life. But the discovery of an abandoned box in his new closet will take Dani on the journey of his life. A box keeping Miguel’s past; his dreams, tears, and worries, makes Dani confront his stand on his own future, considering that perhaps the weirdos are the rest, the bigots, not him.
